title: Eastpoint Mall L6 playground
blurb: Discover family fun at Eastpoint Mall in Simei today!
description: Eastpoint Mall is a haven for families, offering both exciting activities and a wide range of stores. On L6, little ones can set sail on adventure at the nautical-themed play area, complete with ship slides and rope climbing structures. While the children play to their heartsâ€™ content, parents and caregivers can take a well-deserved rest at the nearby seating areas, or enjoy a leisurely round of shopping with peace of mind.
